name: Enduring Days
description:
Loot during the day, fight for your life at night.
Enduring Days is a 32bit inspired action-adventure game. During the day, travel to different parts of the town to collect weapons and ammunition. At night, survive until daybreak as zombies shamble towards your base.


Controls

W,A,S,D - Move
Left Control - Crouch
E - Interact
Tab, I - Inventory
R - Reload

Credits

Game Engine - Godot
Programming, Game Design, Level Design - aptos, tarren.bos
Original Music - aptos
Shotgun Model - Jesse Pletcher
PSX Godot Shaders - MenacingMecha (resource page)
Humanoid Models - the_regressor (sketchfab)
Zombie Animations - Mixamo (website)
Pistol Model - TastyTony (sketchfab)
Quake textures / Level Design tool - TrenchBroom (website)
Weapon sound effects - ZPS GitHub (GitHub)
Skyboxes - All Sky Godot (GitHub)
Ambient Level audio - Moulaythami
